import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Toast } from "antd-mobile" import { uploadImg } from "../request" import '../style.scss' const TimerInfo = () => { const [imgUrl, setImgUrl] = useState(""); const onChange = (e: any) => { if (!e.target.files) return const file = e.target.files[0]; let data = new FormData(); data.append("file", file, file.name) Toast.loading("正在上传中...", 0) uploadImg(data).then((res: any) => { const { data, code, msg } = res.data; if (code === 200) { setImgUrl(data.url) Toast.success("上传成功") } else { Toast.fail(msg || "上传失败,请重新上传") } }).catch((err: any) => { Toast.fail("上传失败,请重新上传") }) } return (
